title: Ep 61: Real Housewives of CVS with Carey O'Donnell

description:
Sexy Unique Podcast co-host, tv writer and comedian Carey O’Donnell is here to talk about his pandemic playground (aka the CVS near his apartment building). If you’re a RHONJ or RHONY fan you will feel this episode on a deep level. If you’re not, I hope you feel it on a deep level anyway. Also, the MASSAGE FLAP, and the PREGNANCY PILLOW (not just for pregnant people!). 


  • Follow Gee Thanks! on Insta: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod! I wanna see you there!
  • Join the Facebook group!: https://www.facebook.com/groups/geethanks/ 
  • Do you like this podcast? LEAVE A REVIEW! It’s the easiest way to support the podcast and it costs you nothing. You have my forever gratitude.
  • Any suggestions, comments, questions, concerns? PLEASE! EMAIL! ME! I want to hear from you! Caroline@GeeThanksJustBoughtIt.Com
